org.drip.spline.stretch

Class CkSegmentSequenceBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.spline.stretch.CkSegmentSequenceBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SegmentSequenceBuilder

    public class CkSegmentSequenceBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements SegmentSequenceBuilder
    CkSegmentSequenceBuilder implements the SegmentSequenceBuilder interface to customize segment sequence construction. Customization is applied at several levels: - Segment Calibration Boundary Setting/Segment Best Fit Response Settings - Segment Response Value Constraints for the starting and the subsequent Segments
